page.title: 14TOURISTS IN ST.HELIER
page.content: There are many tourists in St.Helier all the year round. We made a survey of 100 tourists in the main shopping precinct and found that all except 2% came from Britain; that 51% had never been to Jersey before whereas 10% were here for at least the sixth time. Over half the visitors stayed in hotels and a further 25% in guest houses. We were surprised to find that 85% came to the island by air and only 7% brought their cars on the boat. Another surprise was how few (only 15%) had hired a car, the majority seemed to be getting around on foot, which suggests that they were spending most of their time in the town area. In answer to thhe question "Would you come again?" an overwhelming 96% said that they would!
